Notice of Proposed Class Action Settlement

span.strong:
School Work Notice:
Please be advised that the district's school calendar has been revised. Spring Break has been moved to April 3 through April 10. There are no new assignments for students to work on over Spring Break.
Assignments for the period of April 13 through May 1 will be posted on tigertown.com on Monday, April 13. The district strongly encourages students and parents to access work through the provided electronic format if possible. Parents requesting paper copies of assigned work should email work@tigertown.com or by phone by calling 740-532-4133 select Option 0, and leave a message. Your email or voice message should include your child's name, grade, a contact phone number, email address, physical address. Requested paper copies will be distributed by U.S. Mail or by school personnel to the requested physical address.
In order to facilitate prompt distribution of materials, we ask that all requests for paper copies be made no later than Friday, April 10, 2020.
Completed school work for the period of March 16 through April 3 and period April 13 through May 1 will be collected beginning Monday, May 4, 2020. Secure "drop boxes" will be provided at each campus. Parents also have the option of mailing completed work to a students specified campus. Campus addresses are listed below:
Ironton High School
1701 South Seventh Street
Ironton, OH 45638
Ironton Middle School
302 Delaware Street
Ironton, Ohio 45638
Ironton Elementary School
302 Delaware Street
Ironton, Ohio 45638
Changes to distribution and collection of work represents the districts commitment to providing a safe and secure environment for all stakeholders.
Listing of Additional WiFi Access throughout the City of Ironton can be found here

OPEN ENROLLMENT
The open enrollment period for the Ironton City School District is April 1, 2020 - May 1, 2020. Any student residing outside the Ironton City School District that would like to attend the Ironton City Schools next school year will need to complete an "Open Enrollment Application" and mail it to the Ironton Board of Education, 105 S. Fifth Street, Ironton, OH 45638 before May 1, 2020. To print a copy of the Open Enrollment application go to: http://www.tigertown.com/common/pages/DisplayFile.aspx?itemId=3800760
IMPORTANT NOTICE: CHILD NUTRITION UPDATE
Beginning Monday March 23, 2020, Ironton City Schools Child Nutrition Program will transition to a two day delivery model. Meals will be provided on Mondays and Wednesdays ONLY. Monday pick up will include 4 meals per student (2 Breakfast and 2 Lunch) covering Monday-Tuesday. Wednesday pick up will include 6 meals per student (3 Breakfast and 3 Lunch) covering Wednesday-Friday. In moving from a five day delivery model to a two day model we can continue to provide the same service while reducing exposure for students, staff and parents. Again, this change does not impact the quantity or quality of the meals provided.
LOCATION/TIME:
